name: Snake In The Dark (PierogiMniam)
description:
Power of darkness is with you, my dear snake!

Entering darkness, which allows your snake to pass through walls for a short period of time, makes playing this classic snake a whole new experience. Move into closed boxes, eat existing walls by using power-ups and see your tail becoming new wall as it's being cut off!

Game was made during Sensei Game Jam 2018 by Łukasz Miądowicz team.
